name: GVSoft jCarouselLite
author: Ganeshji Marwaha, Vladimir Giryavyy

sections.description:
The plugin allows you to use all the functions of the jCarouselLite plugin through calling the shortcode in the right place of the content.

Shortcode parameters names are the same as in js plugin, but instead of camel notation you need to use underline notation.

The default delimiter between content items is “/!”
sections.installation:
Instalation via Admin Panel

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New > Search Plugins enter «GVSoft jCarouselLite»
  2. Find the plugin in search results and install it.

Instalation via FTP

  1. Download the .zip archive
  2. Unzip Plugin
  3. Copy the gvs-jcarousellite folder to your wp-content/plugins folder
  4. Activate plugin
  5. (Optional) Adjust settings (Settings -> GVSoft jCarouselLite)

short_description: The plugin allows you to use all the functions of the jCarouselLite plugin through calling the shortcode in the right place of the content.
